name: com.gamelovers.services
description:
This package contains a set of services to ease the development of a basic game architecture. The services provided by this package are:

- CoroutineService to control all coroutines with an end callback
- PoolService to control all object pools by type
- MessageBrokerService to help decoupled modules/systems to communicate with each other while maintaining the inversion of control principle
- TimeService to have a precise control on the game's time (Unix, Unity or DateTime)
- TickService to have a single control point on Unity update cycle
- MainInstaller to have a simple dependency injection binding installer
